games.summary: Cade Cunningham had 32 points and 10 rebounds to help the Detroit Pistons beat the Boston Celtics 112-105 on Monday night. Derrick White scored 31 points as Boston lost its second straight after a five-game winning streak.

Brandon Ingram scored 28 points and the Toronto Raptors snapped a four-game skid with a 106-96 victory Monday night over Miami, extending the Heat’s losing streak to five. Sandro Mamukelashvili scored 11 points and Gradey Dick added 10 for Toronto.
blurbs: 🆕 Simone Fontecchio (MIA) made his first start of the season. 26 min, 3 pts.
📋 Ochai Agbaji (TOR) made just his 3rd start this season. 5 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: Keyonte George scored 37 points and Lauri Markkanen added 33 to lift the Utah Jazz to a 140-133 overtime win against the Dallas Mavericks on Monday night, despite a career-high 42 points from Cooper Flagg . Kyle Filipowski scored 16 of his 25 points in the fourth quarter and overtime as the Jazz won consecutive games for just the second time this season.
blurbs: ⬆️ Kyle Filipowski (UTAH) played 38 min (season avg: 22). 25 pts, 9 reb, 1 ast.
🆕 Brice Sensabaugh (UTAH) made his first start of the season. 22 min, 4 pts.
⬆️ Ryan Nembhard (DAL) played 38 min (season avg: 19). 14 pts, 3 reb, 11 ast.
⬆️ Dwight Powell (DAL) played 24 min (season avg: 12). 7 pts, 9 reb, 0 ast.

games.summary: Nikola Jokic had 39 points, 15 rebounds and 10 assists for his NBA-leading 12th triple-double of the season as the Denver Nuggets outlasted the Houston Rockets 128-125 in overtime on Monday night in a matchup of two of the top three teams in the Western Conference standings. Jamal Murray added 35 points for Denver, including six of his team’s 11 points in overtime.
blurbs: ⬆️ Spencer Jones (DEN) played 41 min (season avg: 17). 11 pts, 3 reb, 0 ast.
⬆️ Tim Hardaway Jr. (DEN) played 40 min (season avg: 25). 13 pts, 1 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: scored 21 of his 31 points in the first half and Cam Spencer added a career-high 27 points as the Memphis Grizzlies beat the Los Angeles Clippers 121-103 on Monday night. Ja Morant also scored 12 points for Memphis in his second game since returning from a calf injury.
blurbs: ⬆️ Kobe Brown (LAC) played 25 min (season avg: 12). 9 pts, 4 reb, 1 ast.
📋 Santi Aldama (MEM) made just his 4th start this season. 3 pts, 2 reb.
